title: THE MODERN WITCH: SUPER INDY
description: Tesha, a pretty, attractive woman, had suffered an attack of unusual weakness and dizziness right when a part from “The Great Book of Yoga” was being read. Tesha is a lady with modern and progressive views, who is an employee of a scientifically oriented industrial plant. In that plant, her duties related mostly to staff people. Her bravery and decisiveness was the reason someone named her the “Witch”.Even more things happened. Somehow, she was able to purchase a very specific “Opus D” photo camera, known just in a very narrow circle of professionals and was considered by them like a magic property item. But how can a devise made out of metal and plastic parts be magic? In this case, any machine cans posses magic properties.And that is not all…
author: Alex Letner
